title: What is the use of analog electronic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where ever we need to compute an integer computation we need analong electronics, and then where we have to perform a digital computation there we uses a digital electronics. Prerequisites to understand the answer: the very basics of computation by electronics & application of electronics in the subject of a academic degree.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Aditya Narayan Pradhan
